leo.Prediction: Today, the Leo sign is influenced by the Sun and Venus. This is a great day to focus on self-care, self-love, and nurturing your relationships. In terms of love, this is a great day for singles to meet new people, and for couples to spend quality time together.

In terms of love, communication is key today, so make sure to express your feelings clearly and listen to your partner.
